title.en: Can a Gangster Leave the Gang?

description.en:
Hyungwon, a member of the Viper Gang, decides to leave the gang and flee the country. He still has a long way to go, but in a weak moment, he ends up having a one-night stand with Sungjin…But who really is Sungjin?

---
- **Note:** 
Part of Bomtoon Short Story [<Gangster Champaign>](https://twitter.com/studio_Weiib/status/1410190460086149126) and the 2nd Story (Ch.6-9) on [<Lezhin>](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/gayng)
---
- [Original Webtoon <Mr.Blue>](https://m.mrblue.com/webtoon/detail.asp?pid=wt_000049115&directview=ok&_AD=Y)
- [Original Webtoon <Naver>](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.nhn?originalProductId=442500)
description.ko:
독사파 조직원인 '형원'은 조직을 도망쳐 해외로 도피하게 된다.
앞길이 막막한 형원은 얼떨결에 바에서 만난 '성진'과 원나잇을 하게 되는데... 과연 성진의 정체는?

---
- **Note:** 
Part of Bomtoon Short Story [<Gangster Champaign>](https://twitter.com/studio_Weiib/status/1410190460086149126) and the 2nd Story (Ch.6-9) on [<Lezhin>](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/gayng)

- [Original Webtoon <Naver>](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.nhn?originalProductId=442500)

altTitles.ja: スローループ

description.en:
When Hiyori - a young girl whose deceased father taught her the joys of fishing - headed out to sea for some alone time, she never thought that she would encounter another girl there.  
After a while, this girl - named Koharu - and her end up fishing and cooking together, and they get to know each other a bit in the meantime. During their brief time together Koharu finds out that the reason that Hiyori went out to sea that day was because she's hesitant towards meeting her new stepfamily that same evening. But what a coincidence! Koharu is also meeting her new family tonight! "No. It can't be a coincidence…" Follow these two 'sisters' and their new life together!  


---
description.ru: Хиори любит ловить рыбу с берега. Этому научил ее отец. Однажды на пляже она знакомится с Кохару, своей сводной сестрой от нового брака матери Хиори.

altTitles.ja: 贄姫と獣の王
Nie-hime to Kemono no Ou
Niehime to Kemono no Oh

altTitles.en: Sacrificial Princess and the King of Beasts
Princess of the Sacrifice & King of the Beast

altTitles.de: Sacrifice to the King of Beasts

altTitles.it: La principessa sacrificio i el re delle bestie

description.en: Saliphie, the 99th sacrifice to the terrifying demon king, learns two secrets about the king: The first, that he has been letting the sacrifices go in secret. The second, that half of his blood is that of a human. She gets to know the king's kindness and sorrow, and then it's announced that the king has taken Saliphie, who wishes to become a source of energy for the king, as his queen, and…?

title.en: Konjiki no Word Master - Yuusha Yonin ni Makikomareta Unique Cheat

altTitles.en: The Golden Word Master - The Four Heroes and the Innocent Bystander with the Unique Cheat

altTitles.ru: Мастер золотых слов: Четыре героя и Наблюдатель с Уникальным читом

altTitles.ja: 金色の文字使い-勇者四人に巻き込まれたユニークチート-

altTitles.ko: 금색의 문자술사: 워드 마스터 유니크 치트

description.en:
In an RPG-like fantasy world consumed by warring nations and racial discrimination, the human kingdom summons five high school students from 21st-century Japan for assistance in their conflict with the demonkin. Now those students, with their experience of MMORPGs at their disposal, will hone their skills to protect the human kingdom of Edea.  
  
However, this isn't their story.  
  
Out of the five students, four of them were given the title of Hero and the fifth one the title of Innocent Bystander. He had been summoned by accident since he sat near the other four students. His name is Hiiro Okamura, an aloof bookworm with traveling and reading as his raison d'etre. Hiiro sees no reason to help the human kingdom in their offensive war with the demonkin, seeing that he isn't a Hero and that he has no real obligation to help them, and decides to leave the kingdom to go on his own adventure.  
  
Soon, Hiiro finds out that he has the very unique skill of Word Magic: magic that can materialize the definition of a word. As he travels more and more, he finds many uses for his Word Magic and many opportunities to find books, level up, and gain some of his own companions. Even with the outbreak of war on the horizon, Hiiro stays true to his desire to travel the new world he's in.
description.pt-br: Okamura Hiiro é introvertido e adora livros. Para ele, os livros são a sua razão de ser. Sua história começa com costume de invocar heróis de outro mundo. Cinco pessoas convocados, mas um deles é apenas um estranho arrastado acidentalmente, essa pessoa é Hiiro. Os outros quatro são seus colegas de classe, mas não é como se eles fossem amigos. Ao contrário dele, eles são riajuus (Pessoas normais na sociedade contrário de Otaku). Hiiro decidiu não para ajudar o país, a sua razão? "Eu não acredito em você. Eu não sou amigo deles. Não é da minha conta, e eu sou uma pessoa comum que se importa com a minha própria vida, então bye", e ele estabelece a sua própria jornada. Pouco sabem os outros heróis, que esta pessoa comum, Hiiro, na verdade esconde um poder que poderá mudar o mundo!

altTitles.en: Mairunovich สวยแซ่บเวอร์ (Thai)

description.en: Kinoshita Mairu has a cute name and she's apologetic for it, because she's ugly. In fact, she's apologetic for her very existence because she's not cute. Classmates call her "Poison Mushroom" behind her back and even her own brother treats her with disdain. However, all of that is about to change with the help of her transgender mentor/neighbor, Fuwari-chan, and the "school king," Kumada Tenyuu!
description.pl:
:||  
Magia makijażu sprzyja każdej dziewczynie. Jednym pomaga mniej, innym więcej. Mairu zdecydowanie należy do tej drugiej grupy. Mówią, że osobom ładnym jest w życiu łatwiej… Z kim? To znaczy, z czym?||

description.en: The most handsome man, Junho, appears in front of Yoonsu, the president of a tailor shop, whose dream is to dress the world’s handsomest men in suits. Please be my model!!!

title.en: My Roommate Isn't From This World

altTitles.ja: 同居人がこの世のモンじゃない 連載版

altTitles.ja-ro: Doukyonin ga Konoyo no Mon janai Rensai-ban

altTitles.en: My Roommate Isn't Of This World - Serialized Version

altTitles.ru: Мой сосед по комнате не из этого мира

altTitles.zh: 同居人不是这个世界的东西

description.en:
The young man's new apartment is haunted, but as it turns out, even the dead have their own personal shortcomings… issues of the flesh included.    
For the dead have lingering desires, and are more susceptible to the world of the living than what one may think. There's anger, there's hate, there's curiosity… and there's love too.    
Here he finds a ghastly girl who observes him quietly, certainly desiring *something*…  
(No wonder the rent is cheap!)

Note: this is the serialized version of the Pixiv webcomic.
description.ja: 念願の一人暮らし。快適なオーディオライフ（アダルト）を満喫できる喜びに浸るのもつかの間・・・その部屋には「何か」がいた。SNS累計250万いいねを達成したトキメキ系ホラー、商業進出!!!

altTitles.ja: はらぺこサキュバスはいかせたいのに！

altTitles.en: The Hungry Succubus Wants to Make Him Cum, But...!
The Hungry Succubus Wants to Consume Him

altTitles.es-la: La succubus hambrienta quiere hacerlo eyacular, ¡Pero...!

description.en:
Kururi-chan The Succubus is an unprecedented super elite!! She's been in a rut lately because her luscious body is too powerful and she can easily be promiscuous. Kururi then discovers Jien, a young virgin monk in training. 

Lucky☆Happy☆Strongest Kururi-chan is going to charge in with great pleasure!! The greedy and confident Succubus and the serious monk clash in this happy love comedy!♡
description.ja: サキュバスのくるりちゃんは空前絶後の超絶スーパーエリート！！わがままボディが最強すぎて簡単に催淫できちゃうから、最近マンネリ気味なのだ。そんなくるりが発見したのは修行中の若き童貞僧・慈円。ラッキー☆ハッピー☆最強くるりちゃん、大歓喜で突撃しちゃいまーす！！強欲自信家サキュバスちゃん×真面目な修行僧くんの激突ハッピーラブコメディ♡
description.es-la: ¡Succubus Kururi-chan es una súper élite sin precedentes! ! Mi cuerpo egoísta es demasiado fuerte y puedo volverme afrodisíaco fácilmente, así que he estado en una rutina recientemente. Tal Kururi descubre a un joven monje virgen, Jien, que está entrenando. ¡Afortunado☆Feliz☆Kururi-chan, el más fuerte, cargará con gran alegría! ! Una comedia romántica feliz entre una súcubo codiciosa y segura de sí misma y un monje en prácticas serio ♡

altTitles.ja: レベリング・マーダー

description.en: One day, Yamato Onitsuka, an office worker, kills another man who attacked him. When he took that man's life, a sound effect rang in his head informing him of his own strengthening and the acquisition of a spell. He had become a "murdelizer", a being whose level goes up when he kills someone. Yamato Onitsuka resolves to survive even if it means killing people as and to keep on living he needs to kill someone within a week or he will die

title.en: Salaryman Exorcist - Okumura Yukio no Aishuu

altTitles.ja-ro: Salaryman Exorcist: Okumura Yukio no Aishū

altTitles.en: Salaryman Exorcist: The Sorrows of Okumura Yukio

altTitles.ja-ro: Salaryman Futsumashi Okumura Yukio no Aishuu

altTitles.ja: サラリーマン祓魔師 奥村雪男の

description.en: A spin-off of Ao no Exorcist, following Okumura Yukio as the main protoganist.

altTitles.ja: 天国大魔境

description.en: Some children live in a comfortably numb world, surrounded by walls. However, one day, a kid named Tokio receives a message asking "Do you want to go outside of the outside?"    Now, from the Heaven that is starting to crumble, the children begin their adventure!
description.fa:
دنیایی پوچ که بچه‌ها در آن با رفاه کامل همراه با دیوارهایی که درون و بیرون را جدا می‌کنند، زندگی می‌کنند اما همه‌ی این‌ها زمانی تغییر می‌کند که یکی از بچه‌ها به نام تاکیو‌ پیامی با این متن دریافت می‌کند: «می‌خوای به خارج از چیزی که اون بیرونه بری؟»

حال از بهشتی که درحال نابودی است بچه‌ها ماجراجویی خود را آغاز می‌کنند.
description.fr: Dans un immense jardin coupé du monde, un groupe d'enfants jouit d'une vie douce et d'insouciance, protégé par des scientifiques. Le monde extérieur leur est inconnu mais certains d'entre eux se questionnent : qu'y a-t-il au-delà des murs de leur paradis ?Pendant ce temps, dans un Japon dévasté par un mystérieux cataclysme, Maru et Kiruko, deux adolescents de la génération post-catastrophe, tentent de survivre dans un monde désolé peuplé de pillards et de monstres difformes. Leur objectif : atteindre "le Paradis".
description.pt: Em um mundo pós-apocalíptico, dois jovens: Maru um garoto amigável e que esconde vários segredos; E Kiruko, uma garota impetuosa e protetora. Juntos eles vagam pelo cenário desolado em busca de um chamado "paraíso". Enquanto isso, em um outro lugar isolado do resto do mundo, vivem várias crianças sem saber do que acontece no exterior. Como essas duas histórias vão se conectar?
description.ru:
Две истории, которые непременно связаны…

Таинственный Мару — мальчик, у которого есть одна цель: найти «Рай»! На пути к ним он обрёл телохранителя — Кируко. Она тоже не так уж проста, как может показаться на первый взгляд. В этом путешествии к «Небесам» они вместе посетят много мест ушедшей эпохи и встретят разных врагов!

Токио — девочка, которая живёт за великими стенами «Небес»! Это место можно назвать раем. Вокруг высокие деревья, зеленая трава, плантации свежих овощей и даже есть небольшой водоем! Вместе с Токио здесь можно встретить и других детей, каждый из которых обладает своим особенным даром. В один из дней Токио получает сообщение: «Ты хочешь выбраться отсюда?» Кажется, с этого момента что-то странное начинает твориться в пределах «Небес»…
description.pt-br: Em um mundo pós-apocalíptico, dois jovens: Maru um garoto amigável e que esconde vários segredos; E Kiruko, uma garota impetuosa e protetora. Juntos eles vagam pelo cenário desolado em busca de um chamado "paraíso". Enquanto isso, em um outro lugar isolado do resto do mundo, vivem várias crianças sem saber do que acontece no exterior. Como essas duas histórias vão se conectar?

title.en: Maydare Tensei Monogatari: Kono Sekai de Ichiban Warui Majo

altTitles.ja: メイデーア転生物語
メイデーア転生物語 この世界で一番悪い魔女

altTitles.en: Tales of Reincarnation in Maydare: The World's Worst Witch

altTitles.de: Wiedergeburt in Maydare: Die bösartigste Hexe der Welt

altTitles.fr: Les contes de la réincarnation en le Maydaré
Les contes de la réincarnation en le Maydaré: La pire sorcière en le monde

description.de: Einst rettete Makia, die Tochter einer berüchtigten Hexe, dem Sklavenjungen Thor das Leben. Gemeinsam wuchsen sie auf und erlernten magische Fähigkeiten. Doch dann reißt das Schicksal sie auseinander und Makia landet an einer Magierakademie, wo sie sich schwört, die beste Schülerin ihres Jahrgangs zu werden, um ihren alten Freund möglichst schnell wiederzufinden. Denn es gibt noch ein weiteres Geheimnis, das sie verbindet: Beide kamen ursprünglich aus einer anderen Welt nach Maydare! Dort war Makia eine gewöhnliche, japanische Oberschülerin, die gemeinsam mit zwei anderen Klassenkameraden umgebracht wurde. Wird es ihr gelingen, das Verbrechen aufzuklären und in der neuen Welt ihr Glück zu finden?
description.en:
Makia is a noble lady descended from an infamous witch. Thor, a boy who was raised with her and came from another world, is chosen to be the knight of the "savior." The two are forced apart, and to see Thor once again, Makia aims to be the top student at Magic School!  


---
description.fr: Makia est une noble dame issue d'une infâme sorcière. Thor, un garçon qui a été élevé avec elle et est venu d'un autre monde, est choisi pour être le chevalier du «sauveur». Les deux sont forcés de se séparer, et pour revoir Thor, Makia vise à être la meilleure élève de Magic School!
description.id: Makia adalah seorang gadis bangsawan yang merupakan keturunan dari seorang penyihir yang dikenal akan kejahatannya. Thor, seorang anak laki-laki yang dirawat bersama makia dan datang dari dunia lain, dipilih untuk menjadi seorang ksatria bagi sang "penyelamat". Keduanya terpaksa harus berpisah karena suatu alasan, dan ketika mereka berdua dipertemukan kembali, Makia bertekad untuk menjadi murid terbaik yang ada di sekolah sihir! ---
description.ru: Загадочный мир под названием «Мейдер». В нём существуют магия, рыцари, драконы и… ведьмы. Макия – юная волшебница из дворянской семьи, являющаяся потомком «Самой худшей ведьмы этого мира», и любительница провести вечерок-другой, изучая новые заклинания. Однажды она встречает необычного паренька, которому даёт имя Тор. Вместе они продолжают углубляться в исследование колдовства и довольно быстро находят общий язык. Это начало длинной истории о девочке, пытающейся понять себя и свои истинные чувства.
description.tr: Makia, kötü şöhretli bir cadının soyundan gelen asil bir hanımefendi. Başka bir dünyadan gelen ve Makia ile birlikte büyüyen Thor, "Kurtarıcı"nın şövalyesi olarak seçiliyor. İkisi de birbirlerinden ayrılmak zorunda kalıyorlar ve Makia, Thor'u bir kez daha görmek için Büyü Okulu'nun en iyi öğrencisi olmayı hedefliyor!

description.en:
The hidden dangerous   
secrets of five stories.  
  
Let’s meet them now

altTitles.ja: 宵子の肖像

description.en: Hana is a college student with nothing to do and no dreams. One day, she meets Yoiko, a self-proclaimed "grudge spirit," and is told that she is cursed by Yoiko. In order to break the curse, Hana helps Yoiko to become a Buddha! In order to clear her unfulfilled spirit, Hana uses only a sooty, blackened painting as a clue to get closer to the true identity of this beautiful ghost. Hana is gradually captivated by Yoiko's natural charm!

altTitles.ja: マイ・ブロークン・マリコ

description.en:
Tomoyo Shiino has stood by her friend Mariko through years of abuse, abandonment, and depression. However horrific her circumstances, their friendship has been the one reassuring constant in Mariko's life-and Tomoyo's too. That is, until Tomoyo is utterly blindsided by news of Mariko's death. In life, Tomoyo felt powerless to help her best friend out of the darkness that ultimately drove her over the edge. Now, Tomoyo is determined to liberate Mariko's ashes for one final journey together... to set free her dear, broken Mariko.
  
This story deals with suicide and its aftermath, plus abuses of all kind that preceded it. Reader discretion is strongly advised.

Live-action movie adaptation: [MyDramaList](https://mydramalist.com/719435-my-broken-mariko) - [IMDB](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt17512706/) - [Bangumi](https://bgm.tv/subject/366281)

altTitles.ja: 高森くんを黙らせたいっ！！

altTitles.vi: Đừng nghĩ thế nữa mà, Takamori-kun!

description.en: Minamikawa-san, a girl with the ability to read minds is curious about the boy sitting next to her, Takamori-kun. It's because Takamori-kun's mind is so damn loud...!!
description.ja: 南川さんは隣の席の高森くんの「ヒミツ」を知っている。それは高森くんの心の声が聞こえるということ。そしてさらに、高森くんは南川さんのことが大好きだということ…!!毎日毎日うるさい高森くんの心の声を黙らせられるのか…!?テレパス青春ラブコメ、開幕です!!
description.vi: Một cô gái có khả năng đọc suy nghĩ người khác và cậu bạn kế bên có máu simp lỏ. Điều gì sẽ chờ đợi cả hai phía trước?

title.en: Amarimono Isekaijin no Jiyuu Seikatsu: Yuusha ja Nai node Katteni Yarasete Moraimasu

altTitles.ja: 余りモノ異世界人の自由生活～勇者じゃないので勝手にやらせてもらいます～

altTitles.ja-ro: Amarimono Isekaijin no Jiyuu Seikatsu: Yuusha ja Nai node Katteni Yarasete Moraimasu

altTitles.en: Free Life of a Leisurely Otherworldly Person: I’m Not a Hero, So I’ll Do Whatever I Want

description.en: Shinichi Sagara, a black corporate warrior. After overcoming a nightmare of consecutive workdays, he finally got on a bus to return home, but unexpectedly, he got transferred to a different world. A young goddess on her knees, “I’m so sorry! I’m sorry! I am really sorry!!” The story unfolded with a climax. I escaped from the country that treats the otherworlders like company slaves and set out for freedom. I changed my name from Shinichi to Shin and moved to another country to live a slow life. But I had to take care of the stupid prince, hunt and gather, rant at the stupid prince, raise my adventurer rank, listen to the goddess complain, discipline the stupid prince, rant at the stupid prince again, then contribute to society…. So, this is the beginning of my slow life in another world.
description.ja: ブラック企業に勤める相良真一（シン）は、勇者召喚に巻き込まれて異世界に転移する。ところが、彼が転移した先は異世界人の優れた能力を搾取するトンデモ国家だった。即座にヤバイ臭いを嗅ぎつけたシンは、早々に国外脱出を敢行。他国の山村で念願のスローライフを始める。そんなある日、シンは領主屋敷の離れに幽閉されている貴人と知り合う。この出会いが、静かな田舎暮らしを一変させることに…!?
description.pt-br: Shinichi Sagara, um guerreiro corporativo. Depois de superar um pesadelo de dias úteis consecutivos, ele finalmente pegou um ônibus para voltar para casa, mas inesperadamente foi transferido para um mundo diferente. Uma jovem deusa de joelhos, “ Sinto muito! Eu sinto Muito! Sinto muito !! ” A história se desenrolou com um clímax. Eu escapei do país que trata os outros mundos como os da empresa e parti para a liberdade. Mudei meu nome de Shinichi para Shin e me mudei para outro país para viver uma vida lenta. Mas eu tive que cuidar do príncipe estúpido, caçar e reunir, reclamar com o príncipe estúpido, elevar minha posição de aventureiro, ouvir a deusa reclamar, disciplinar o príncipe estúpido, reclamar com o príncipe estúpido novamente, depois contribuir para a sociedade…. Então, este é o começo da minha vida lenta em outro mundo.

altTitles.ja: 復讐チャンネル ウラミン ～公開処刑ナマ配信中～

description.en:
The online video site "Uramin TV" is a popular channel that distributes videos depicting punishment on harmful people and has over 3 million subscribers. 
Minori Yoshiura, also known as "Uramin", who runs this site, has enthusiastic followers, but in fact, she was bullied horribly when she was in elementary school and became a shut-in. She vows to take revenge on her bullying perpetrators and broadcasts her revenge videos live. The number one target is Takemura Kyouka, the ringleader of bullying who has pushed her to the depths of hell and is now living a carefree life!

altTitles.en: You Have to Kill to Survive
You Have to Kill to Live

description.en:
Terminally-ill reincarnators are resurrected with a limited lifespan after death. They gain unique powers that transcend human capabilities, allowing them to steal other people's lifespans.

Twenty-one years ago, the most malevolent reincarnator vanished after killing 144 people and taking everything from me.

Thus began my 20-year quest for revenge.
description.ko:
사망 후 시한부의 수명을 가진 채 부활하는 시한부활자는 인간을 초월하는 고유의 능력을 얻게 되고, 그 능력으로 타인의 수명을 빼앗을 수 있다. 
21년 전, 144명을 죽이고 모든 것을 앗아간 후 종적을 감췄던 최악의 부활자를 잡기 위해 20년을 준비한 복수가 시작된다.

altTitles.en: Studio Apartment, Good Lighting, Angel Included.

altTitles.ja: ワンルーム、日当たり普通、天使つき。

altTitles.zh: 單間, 光照尚好, 附帶天使

description.en:
What will happen when you wake up, and find a cute girl lying next to you in bed? Furthermore, she is not an ordinary girl, but an Angel who comes from Heaven???

Shintarou Tokamitsu is a high school boy living alone. One day, he found a beautiful girl sitting on his balcony. Her name is Towa, but what is her true identity? A romantic comedy between two innocent souls.
description.ja: 人暮らしの男子高校生、徳光森太郎。彼が自宅のベランダで出会ったのは清楚で優しい女の子『とわ』。けれど彼女の正体は…？　無垢な二人の胸キュン同居ラブコメディ♪
description.vi: Chúng ta đã quen với câu chuyện về anh nhân viên nhặt được bé JK tại lề đường. Nhưng sẽ ra sao nếu vẫn với chủ đề nhặt được người ấy, cậu học sinh năm nhất cao trung lại nhặt được một thiên thần từ Thiên Đàng ngay trong căn hộ của cậu ta? Chuyện gì sẽ xảy ra tiếp theo??
description.pt-br:
O que  aconteceria se você acordasse e visse uma linda garota deitada ao seu lado na cama? Além disso, ela não é uma garota comum, mas sim um Anjo que vem do Céu???

Shintarou Tokamitsu é um estudante do ensino médio que mora sozinho. Um dia, ele encontrou uma linda garota sentada em sua varanda. O nome dela é Towa, mas qual é a sua verdadeira identidade? Uma comédia romântica entre duas almas inocentes.

altTitles.th: ใต้ร่มวันฝนพรำ

description.en:
Sisters Ju-eun and Hye-jin lived a miserable life. After the death of their mother, their 'father', who had always been absent from their lives, suddenly appeared. Hye-jin, the older sister, agreed to his suggestion: if one of them joins the 'Daesung Group', he will rescue them from their poverty-stricken life. However... three years after entering 'Daesung Group', she dies in vain. This left Ju-eun struggling with despair at her helplessness in preventing her sister’s death. But then, she gets a new opportunity when she is brought back in time and Ju-eun decides to take her sister's place by becoming the daughter of the 'Daesung Group' that killed Hye-jin.

---
Sisters Ju-eun and Hyejin grew up in absolute poverty. After their mother’s death, Hyejin accepts the offer to join their estranged father’s wealthy family. But when Hyejin turns out dead just three years later, Ju-eun is grief-stricken. She grabs at the chance to travel back in time and take her sister’s place where she meets the kind but mysterious Iho.

title.en: Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? Four-Panel Comic: Days of Goddess

altTitles.ja: Dungeon ni Deai o Motomeru no wa Machigatte Iru Darou ka 4-koma - Kami-sama no Nichijou

altTitles.en: Dungeon ni Deai o Motomeru no wa Machigatte Iru Darou ka 4koma - Days of Goddess

altTitles.ja: ダンジョンに出会いを求めるのは間違っているだろうか4コマ【神様の日常】

altTitles.ja-ro: Dungeon ni Deai o Motomeru no wa Machigatte Iru Darou ka 4koma - Kami-sama no Nichijou

description.en: Adventurers dive into the dangerous dungeon with the help of the <Grace> granted by transcendental existences called Gods. This is the story that covers the hilarious daily life of such Gods and Goddesses and their <Familia>, who are forced to run around on their whims.

altTitles.ja: さるまね

description.en: Despite the food shortages caused by famine, the mountain village where the protagonist Kai lives is able to pursue a somewhat better life than others by hunting wild animals. However, one day, a man who says he got lost in the mountains comes to the village. Kai is suspicious of the man, who refuses to make eye contact, but he and his family welcome him. That night, another uninvited beast though sneaks into the outskirts of the village...
description.es-la: Tercer año de la era Temmei. En medio de la escasez de alimentos provocada por la hambruna, el pueblo de montaña donde vive el protagonista Kaei consigue ganarse la vida algo mejor que los demás cazando animales salvajes. Un día, sin embargo, llega a la aldea un hombre que afirma haberse perdido en las montañas. El hombre se niega a mirar a Kaei a los ojos, pero él y su familia le reciben con los brazos abiertos. Esa noche, en las afueras de la aldea, entran más bestias no invitadas...

title.en: Being a Maid Is Better Than Being a Princess

altTitles.en: A Maid Was More of a Calling Than a Princess
It's Better to Be a Maid Than to Be a Princess

altTitles.es: Mi vocación era ser doncella, no princesa
Ser sirvienta es mejor que una princesa torturada

altTitles.vi: Trở Thành Hầu Nữ Còn Quan Trọng Hơn Là Làm Công Chúa

altTitles.zh: 比起公主，侍女才是我的天职

description.en:
Siana was a princess of a small kingdom. Until the imperial army attacked…

Just before her neck was about to be cut by the cruel prince, Siana screamed, “Please spare me!”

Towards the prince with blood staining his beautiful face, Siana pleaded with a desperate voice.

“I have many skills learned in the palace. Wouldn’t I be useful as a maid?”

And so, Siana became a probationary maid of the palace. But surprisingly, the job suited her temperament?! When she swept the floors, the corridors became clean, when she kneaded dough, sweet cookies were baked, when she did laundry, the bedding became white and fragrant! She only did her best as a maid, but gradually, the royal family began to warm up to Siana.

“The tea you brewed is always the best.”

“The dress you made? Truly beautiful.”

“I want you to educate the prince.”

But she never thought of capturing this man’s heart…

“I feel the same.”

“…”

“I can’t live without you, Siana,” hearing the tender voice of the prince, Siana tightly closed her eyes.

Look, Your Highness. I just want to live as an ordinary maid!

altTitles.ja: サイレンサー

description.en:
(from ebookjapan):

Shizuka Katsuragi is a female detective who loves silencers. She is assigned to the "annex" of the Community Safety Division, a hive of activity in the Tokyo Metropolitan Police Department.

 Her partner is Kenya Iha, the most eccentric person in the Metropolitan Police Department. The pairing of the two is a strange one, as they both pull each other down. 

With the policy of "conquer poison with poison," her beloved gun quietly blows fire today...

title.en: Make the Exorcist Fall in Love

altTitles.ja: エクソシストを堕とせない

altTitles.th: เอ็กซอร์ซิส ไม่มีวันตกหลุมรัก

altTitles.fr: Make the Exorcist Fall in Love

description.en: As the strongest exorcist, a boy chosen by God was engaged in mortal combat with the Demon Kings. Although he bears the fate of humanity on his shoulders, he actually wants to make sweets peacefully. One day, he meets a girl... This is a story of love and hope growing in the midst of a holy war.
description.fr: Un jeune prêtre, entraîné par le Vatican pour devenir l'exorciste le plus puissant du monde, reçoit pour mission divine de protéger une jeune artiste, Imuri Atsuki. Sur les conseils de son mentor, il espère néanmoins trouver l'amour afin de soulager son esprit du lourd fardeau qui lui incombe. Imuri sera-t-elle celle qui lui apportera son salut ?
description.ja: 神に選ばれし少年は、最強のエクソシストとして魔王たちと死闘を繰り広げていた。人類の命運を背負いつつも本当は静かにお菓子作りをしていたい、そんな彼に訪れた一人の少女との出会い…。これは壮絶な聖戦の中で芽吹いた、恋と希望の物語。

title.en: Minasama ni wa Jinken ga Gozaimasen

altTitles.ja: 皆様には人権がございません

altTitles.vi: Các ngươi không có quyền con người

description.en: XX years have passed since the enforcement of "The Human Rights Proper Use Act." In the city, "humans with rights" live prosperously, while "humans designated as livestock without rights" are displayed in shop windows. The humans used as pets, experimental animals, and meat are pitiful creatures living in a world separate from mine... or so it was supposed to be.

title.en: Kore kara Dandan Shiawase ni Natte Iku Kowai Onna Joushi

altTitles.ja: これからだんだん幸せになっていく怖い 女上司

altTitles.ar: رئيسة مرعبة تزداد سعادة وسعادة من الآن فصاعدًا

altTitles.ja-ro: Kore kara Dandan Shiawase ni Natte Iku Kowai Onna Joushi
Korekara Dondon Shiawase ni Natte iku Kowai Jōshi

altTitles.en: A Scary Boss, But From Now on She's Going to Be Happier and Happier

altTitles.es-la: Una jefa que da miedo, pero a partir de ahora va a ser cada vez más feliz.

description.ar: مديرتي مخيفة للغايه، لكن من الأن وصاعدًا سأبذل قصارى جهدي لجعلها الأسعد.
description.en:
This is a heart-pounding love comedy between "Manager Tsuruse'', a female boss who is scary at work but whose hobbies are cute clothes(?!), and "Tsukinawa-kun'', a new male employee who joins the company mid-career!

There is also a FANBOX version, a collection of 0.5 "Naughty" stories: 
[Kowai Onna Joushi ga Nuidara H de Kawaikatta Hanashi - FANBOX 0.5 Matome【R18】](https://mangadex.org/title/ef970af6-8357-43bb-9bd1-fe09dba78624/kowai-onna-joushi-ga-nuidara-h-de-kawaikatta-hanashi-fanbox-0-5-matome)
description.es-la: Mi jefa da mucho miedo, pero mientras más hablo con ella deja de hacerlo.

altTitles.ja: 今朝も揺られてます

altTitles.en: They Are Still Being Shaken This Morning

description.en: This is your typical story of a boy who's secretly in love with a girl, they both share a 20 minute ride on the commuter train on their way to different schools, will the boy be able to approach the girl and confess his love? And also... What he doesn't know: There's 3 other passengers that secretly support the boy's secret love towards the girl! Read now the hijinks that ensue when the boy tries to approach the girl; from the creator of *[Jitsu wa Watashi wa](https://mangadex.org/title/a990c2a1-b54f-4f4f-986c-3cdab1c9f2f9/)* and *[Yumemi ga Oka Wonderland](https://mangadex.org/title/32bbfefa-8a58-462c-bc9e-e9dd3bd4c152/)*.
description.pt-br: Esta é a típica história de um garoto que está secretamente apaixonado por uma garota. Ambos compartilham uma viagem de 20 minutos no trem do subúrbio a caminho de escolas diferentes. O garoto será capaz de se aproximar da garota e confessar seu amor? E, além disso... O que ele não sabe: há três outros passageiros que secretamente apoiam o amor secreto do garoto pela garota! Leia agora as confusões que acontecem quando o garoto tenta se aproximar da garota; do criador de *[Jitsu wa Watashi wa](https://mangadex.org/title/a990c2a1-b54f-4f4f-986c-3cdab1c9f2f9/)* e *[Yumemi ga Oka Wonderland](https://mangadex.org/title/32bbfefa-8a58-462c-bc9e-e9dd3bd4c152/)*.

title.en: Psycho x Past: Ryouki Satsujin Sennyuu Sousa

altTitles.en: Psycho x Past: Bizarre Murder Undercover Investigation

altTitles.ja: サイコ×パスト 猟奇殺人潜入捜査

description.en: The "psycho suspense" manga follows Godai, a policeman who was removed from the investigations division of the police due to violence toward criminals. He teams up with Hidaka, a man who is a self-proclaimed "paranormal police investigator" with claims to have the ability to send Godai in the past to prevent all the horrific crimes that happened, is that even possible and what will be the consequences?

Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

title.en: Kimi to Sekai ga Owaru Hi ni

altTitles.en: Love You as the World Ends

altTitles.ja: 君と世界が終わる日に

description.en: On the day of his proposal, Hibiki Mamiya, a young man, is trapped in a tunnel collapse accident. When he narrowly escapes from the tunnel, the world has completely changed. A dilapidated cityscape, countless bodies, and the "living dead" wandering around the city... Amidst this abnormal situation, Hibiki desperately searches for his lover, but he is nowhere to be found. Will the few survivors survive together in this hopeless situation? The manga is based on the television drama, "Love You as the World Ends".

altTitles.pt-br: Aulas de luta de primeira classe

description.en:
The bullied loser Kim Jaehyuk receives 'Top 1 Fighting Tutoring'!
Kim Jaehyuk is a high school student who has been living in despair under the torment of bullies. He's good at studying, but he'd rather be good at fighting.
Then, as if by fate, a 'fighting tutor' comes into his life!
description.pt-br: Kim Jaehyuk é um estudante do ensino médio que vive em desespero sob o tormento dos valentões. Ele é bom nos estudos, mas preferiria ser bom na luta. Então, o destino põe um "tutor de luta" em sua vida!

altTitles.ja: 人狼機ウィンヴルガ 叛逆編

description.en: The adventure of a girl who has lost her memory begins...
description.es-la: Win, una chica que se despierta en un mundo extraño, salva a una chica llamada Kyu de ser perseguida por lobos en el bosque, y ella le permite vivir en su mansión. En la mansión, Nigou, la maestra de Kyu, le enseña todo tipo de cosas para convertirse en una auténtica guerrera...

altTitles.ja: フェイト／ゼロ

description.en:
War of the Holy Grail—Pursuing the power of the "Holy Grail" which grants a miracle, this is a contest in which seven magi summon seven Heroic Spirits to compete for it. In that battle whose conclusion was postponed three times, now, the fourth war commenced again. Entrusting their dearest wish of victory, the magi joined the battleground called "Fuyuki," but amongst them, there was a man who was always alone, and could not find out the meaning behind his fights. His name was Kotomine Kirei. Not comprehending the guidance of fate, Kirei was lost, and had kept questioning. Why someone like his was given the Command Seals. However, the fate of his fights crossed Kirei's path with a nemesis by chance. That person is—Emiya Kiritsugu. A man who was sterner than anyone else, more merciless than anyone else, and who sought the miracle of the Holy Grail.  
  
Merely recited in fragments in Fate/stay night, this is the Fourth War of the Holy Grail 10 years ago. The truth which unfolded behind the battle between Shirou's foster father, Rin's father, and the younger Kotomine Kirei, is finally revealed…
description.ru: Участниками Пятой войны за Святой Грааль были дети, и тем не менее противостояние мастеров было жестоким и кровопролитным. Но какие же ужасы явятся миру, если за дело примутся взрослые, опытные волшебники, принимающие холодные решения даже в отношении собственных родственников и любимых? Четвертая война разобьет много сердец и разрушит множество жизней. На поле боя сойдутся очень разные люди - от учащегося в Ассоциации до городского маньяка. Но кому же из них будет суждено добраться до Грааля и исполнить свою мечту?

title.en: A Second Chance At Saving You

altTitles.fr: Pour te sauver de ta tragique destinée

description.en: Empress Niobe Roden, the precious Blue Rose of the Rustan Empire, is in love with another man--the one to save her from her tyrant husband. She patiently waits for her lover Eloi, but all that returns is the news that the Emperor has beheaded him. Hopeless in her own imprisonment, Niobe ends her life only to be returned to the past–exactly two years before her marriage with Valon. With the second chance at life, Niobe is determined to conceal and protect her true love.

altTitles.ja: 嘆きのアリシア

description.en: The manga continues with the story of Alicia from "A Female Warrior Who Fell to the Goblin Kingdom"...

altTitles.ja: 血界戦線 Beat 3 Peat

description.en: Kekkai Sensen: Beat 3 Peat centers around the crime fighting organization "Libra" and their battles in Hellsalem's Lot, formerly known as New York City. Hellsalem's Lot was created in a single night when a portal to the "Beyond" opened, and now it is a paranormal melting pot of monsters, magic, and the everyday mundane city life. It's up to Libra to prevent the horrors of this city from spreading to the outside world.

title.en: A Dog Lives in the Imperial Palace Garden

altTitles.en: A Dog Lives in the Garden of the Imperial Palace

altTitles.es: Un perro vive en el jardín imperial

altTitles.th: เปิดข้อเสนอลับ วิวาห์ร้าย

description.en: The Devon family sits on a mountain of debt and they are on the brink of bankruptcy. This is no fault of hers of course, but Courtney Devon has always been the one painted as the villain in her family. However, the family is in dire straits and they have to do something, anything, to raise some money and get out of this situation. But then one day, news arrives from the Imperial Palace that His Royal Highness the crown prince has decided to make Courtney the crown princess. Seemingly a typical prince on the outside, His Royal Highness is actually quite a troublemaker with a dark side. Will this arrangement end up solving Courtney Devon’s problems or just complicating things further? Will a love against all odds bloom or will someone end up in the doghouse...?
description.id: Keluarga Devon terlilit hutang dan berada di ambang kebangkrutan. Tentu saja ini bukan salahnya, tapi Courtney Devon selalu digambarkan sebagai penjahat di keluarganya. Namun, keluarga tersebut berada dalam kesulitan dan mereka harus melakukan sesuatu, apa saja, untuk mengumpulkan sejumlah uang dan keluar dari situasi ini. Namun suatu hari, datang kabar dari Istana Kekaisaran bahwa Yang Mulia putra mahkota telah memutuskan untuk menjadikan Courtney sebagai putri mahkota. Tampaknya seorang pangeran pada umumnya, Yang Mulia sebenarnya adalah pembuat onar dengan sisi gelap. Apakah pengaturan ini akan menyelesaikan masalah Courtney Devon atau justru semakin memperumit masalah? Akankah cinta melawan segala rintangan berkembang atau akankah seseorang berakhir di rumah anjing...?

altTitles.ja: うるわしの宵の月

altTitles.fr: Ton visage au clair de lune

description.en:
Yoi is a girl who is called "prince" by those around her and treated like a hero in a girls' manga.
Then she meets Ichimura, who is also called "prince." He calls her "beautiful" and saves her from getting tangled up with a drunk at a convenience store, and the two quickly get close!
Is this encounter fate? Or is it bad luck?!
The story of a man and a woman, both called "princes," begins now!
description.pt: Takiguchi Yoi é uma garota de aparência masculina, tratada como um príncipe. Quando entra no ensino médio, o conflito começará ao conhecer um garoto que, efetivamente, pode roubar da nossa protagonista o título de "homem mais desejado" da escola.
description.pt-br: Takiguchi Yoi é uma garota de aparência masculina, tratada como um príncipe. Quando entra no ensino médio, o conflito começará ao conhecer um garoto que, efetivamente, pode roubar da nossa protagonista o título de “homem mais desejado” da escola.

altTitles.ja: ヤワラ!

description.en:
Yawara Inokuma is a talented judoka raised and trained by her grandfather Jigoro. Her grandfather says she's supposed to become the hope of Japan's judo team in Seoul in 1988, but she has different plans: to finish high school and find a boyfriend…like all her friends. But being a normal girl and an olympic champion are two different things. Which path will she choose to follow?  
  
---
- **Won the 35th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga in 1990**

The descendant of a once great wizarding family, Elric Mervinger is unable to perform magic due to a rare medical condition.

While attempting to cure his disease, he stumbles upon the demon Mephistopheles, who tries to possess Elric to free himself from a dragon’s trap. But when Elric ends up absorbing Mephisto instead, the two become bound together.

With Mephisto by his side, will this new power allow Elric to restore his family to its former glory? Or will he just end up being devoured?

---
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q5aQzOSvSDw)
description.fr:
Elric Melvinger.
L’unique héritier de la prestigieuse famille magique.
Bien qu’il possédait un talent inné, il avait trop de talent, et de ce fait, ne pouvait pas apprendre la magie. Cependant, il a alors reçu une bénédiction laissée par ses ancêtres !

[Manger des démons.]
[Avaler des démons.]
[Boire des démons.]
[Continue d’accumuler des démons en toi, et réalise une nouvelle magie !]

Élève-toi.
Va si haut que personne ne pourra jamais t’atteindre.
description.ko:
"어이, 메피. 여기 언령마법 풀이 좀 써주시죠?"

기묘한 기연으로 한 몸 살이를 하게 된
천재 마법사 엘릭과 원죄의 마왕 메피스토펠레스.

마법 불능 엘릭이 가보 '마도 경식'의 힘을 빌어
메피스토의 흑마법을 뒤집고 그 힘을 흡수해버린
명실상부 갑을 관계!

하지만,
엘릭은 메피스토의 힘을 최대한 흡수해 강해지려 하고
메피스토는 자신의 기운을 최대한 불어넣어 지배하려 하고...
실상은 서로가 갑이자 을일 수밖에 없는 운명.
마도 명문 메르빙거 가의 재건을 꿈꾸는 엘릭과
엘릭의 몸을 지배해 다시금 고귀한 마왕으로 부활하려는 메피스토의
'동상이몽 마족삼킴 어드벤쳐'

"좋게 좋게 가시죠?"
"하찮은 인간 따위에게... 굴복할 것 같으냐!!!"

---
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q5aQzOSvSDw)

altTitles.en: Violence Jack - Advent of the Demon Lord

altTitles.ja: バイオレンスジャック
バイオレンスジャック　魔王降臨編

description.en:
September 11, 197x, In the whole Kanto region a magnitude 8-9 violent earthquake occurred. Scholars called it the great destruction of the Showa Era, but the people called it the earthquake from hell! Volcanoes erupted, buildings crumbled, Tokyo became decimated in a single day. The government, after failing to recover the city, abandons Tokyo and moves the capital. The survivors form a society with no laws. In this harsh lawless world emerges Jack, a 10 foot giant who annihilates anyone and anything in his path. The manga details his journey.  
  
The numbering is from the Complete Edition, with around 20 Chapters per volume.

Five years after his divorce, Johnny Light found himself employed by private detective Terry Koh in Harbour Bay, a lawless city South of Singapore, where he met the Italian-Korean girl by the name of Minjeong Cassano.

altTitles.ja: ちえりの恋は8メートル

altTitles.pt-br: O amor de Chieri tem 8 metros

description.en:
An ordinary high school student, Yumeji Kotaki, is transferred to his class by his childhood friend, Chieri Omine, who has grown to 8 meters in height! Yumeji is assigned as "caretaker" to support Chieri's school life. Their daily life is full of excitement due to the height difference! The height difference is nothing to worry about!

The start of a literally larger-than-life romcom!
description.pt-br:
Uma aluna transferida que tem 8 metros de altura...?! 
Amigos de infância se reencontram, mas nem tudo é como antes… Uma mudança na relação entre Chieri e Yumeji, acompanhe o desenrolar desta comédia romântica gigantesca.

title.en: You've Got the Wrong House, Villain

altTitles.en: You Have Got the Wrong House, Villain
You've Come to the Wrong House, Villain

altTitles.fr: Tu es arrivé à la maison fautive, méchant

altTitles.ar: لقد حصلت على المنزل الخطأ أيها الشرير

altTitles.es-la: Villano, estás en la casa equivocada

description.en:
As if it weren't enough for me to be reincarnated as a child in the slums, I was taken to a city of crime and became a test subject. But then, when I saw the man that came to destroy the research institute, I realized that this place was the world of *Piper*, a reverse harem novel. While living a relatively normal life after escaping from the institute, the heroine of the novel moved in next door. From the looks of it, I might be the heroine's neighbor, an extra. Originally, the heroine was to save the unconscious and fatally wounded villain and in return, be subject to a fanatical obsession. But, why. Why is the sub-villain collapsed in front of my house? The sub-villain, Lakis Avalon, was the king of the underworld and the very same frightening man that I had met at the institute before. I took a moment’'s glance around then I kicked the man’s body away.

Hey, you're got the wrong house, villain.

Ploy has been avoiding her family and anything that's related to her family's business as long as she could. She is now, however, forced to be part of the business and dreads what her parents have in store for her. Hopefully, there is one thing that could help her bear all of it as a certain student applies for an internship at the hotel Ploy is at.
description.pt-br: Ploy tem evitado sua família e qualquer coisa relacionada aos negócios pelo tempo que pôde. Mas agora ela é forçada a fazer parte do negócio e teme o que seus pais têm guardado para ela. Esperançosamente, há uma coisa que poderia ajudá-la a suportar tudo isso, pois, certa aluna se candidata a um estágio no hotel em que Ploy trabalha.

altTitles.ja: 理解のあるカレンちゃん

description.en:
“You’re amazing for being alive another day!”

A Manga about an understanding girlfriend who rewards you with a “log-in bonus” every day.

A fierce love collab at City Casual, the nations top men's magazine, between the bear-like leader of the planning team, Baik Youngchan, and the beautiful but prickly Design team lead, Seo Hyunsoo. After Seo Hyunsoo accidentally sees Baik Youngchan's naked body, he begins to question his sexual preference. What happens when Seo Hyunsoo gets involved with his office nemesis who he'd never dreamed of getting mixed up with?

altTitles.en: レンタルおにいちゃん

description.en: What the young girl rents is not a movie, but a brother, and the wonderful warm feeling of spending time with him. With her parents deceased, and her once kind brother changed… What the girl seeks is the warmth of a family that she once had. Even if it's a rental one.
description.id:
Menceritakan seorang anak perempuan bernama Kanami, dia mempunyai kakak yang baik dan perhatian terhadapnya, namun sebuah insiden tidak terduga terjadi yang membuat kakaknya tersebut berubah drastis dari kakak yang baik dan perhatian berubah menjadi kakak yang tidak peduli terhadap sekitarnya, karena hal itu Kanami merasa diasingkan dan tidak dipedulikan. Namun, sesuatu yang tidak terduga terjadi…  
  
**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/ichiiro_hako)   
- [Author's Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=11877871)
description.pt: O que a garota alugou foi, um tempo feliz e amigável com seu falso irmão. A morte de seus pais… A completa mudança de seu irmão que era gentil… A garota que agora está sozinha e ferida, almejando a gentileza que um dia viu em seu irmão… Diz: Eu vou alugar um irmão! …Com dinheiro. Mesmo alugando, eu quero ter uma "família".
